tool_description: Returns the list of all optimal solutions (QTM not HTM) for a given pocket cube (2x2x2) position.

api_list.name: getRandomSolution
api_list.description: Returns JSON data consisting of a random optimal solution for a given cube position.

required_parameters.name: position
required_parameters.description: The current configuration of the pocket cube.

api_list.name: getAllSolutions
api_list.description: Returns JSON data consisting of all optimal solutions for a given cube position.

required_parameters.name: position
required_parameters.description: The current configuration of the pocket cube.
